archetypes.name: Visionary
archetypes.notes: Big-picture leader; inspiring but can control too much

archetypes.name: Dreamer
archetypes.notes: Hopeful and imaginative; risks being unrealistic

archetypes.name: Architect
archetypes.notes: Flexible planner and builder; may resist chaos

archetypes.name: Catalyst
archetypes.notes: Energetic team player; can overlook details

archetypes.name: Realist
archetypes.notes: Practical and steady; wary of change

archetypes.name: Sage
archetypes.notes: Analytical and wise; may resist intuition
